case_title: USA et al v. Bouton et al
case_info_full_case_name: USA et al v. Bouton et al

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to be imprisoned for a total of 24 months, with credit for time served form 9/11/09 to 10/15/09. Supervised Release for a total term of 3 years, by the US Probation Office in the Western District of Washington. Special Assessment of $100.00 which was paid on 10/7/10(Receipt No. H031969). Restitution of $62,311.42, jointly and severally with co-defendant Danai Vira, as stated in the Restitution Order being entered in this case, except that Danai Vira is only required to make restitution in the amount of $30,000.

charges.charge_description: PUBLIC MONEY, PROPERTY OR RECORDS: Trafficking in stolen govt property(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on Oral Motion of the USA.

charges.charge_description: Steal and knowingly convert to his use and the use of another, and without authority, did sell and convery a thing of value of the United States with a value exceeding $1,000; and conspire with one or more other persons to commit an offense against the United States, and perform an act to effect the object of the conspiracy

charges.charge_offence_description: Steal and knowingly convert to his use and the use

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby sentenced to time served. Supervised Release for a total term of 3 years. Special Assessment of $100.00, due immediately.

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby sentenced to time served. Supervised Release for a total term of 3 years, by the US Probation Office in the Middle District of Florida. Special Assessment of $100.00, due immediately. Restitution of $30,000.00, jointly and severally with co-defendant Wilfred Bouton, as stated in the Restitution Order being entered in this case.
